title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 84 - Reporting Of Financial Condition Under Generally Accepted Accounting Principles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 84 - Reporting Of Financial Condition Under Generally Accepted Accounting Principles

State Regulations
§ 84.1 - Reporting of financial condition under generally accepted accounting principles

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 84

Statutory authority: Insurance Law, §§201, 301, 1204, 1313

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
